Package bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models

Class ImagePBM

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models.Image
bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models.ImagePBM
public class ImagePBM extends Image
Represents a PBM format image, a subclass of the Image class. It provides specific implementation for PBM image format.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    ImagePBM(Pixel[][] pixels, int[] sizes, String imageName, String format)
    Constructs an ImagePBM object with specified pixel data, size, image name, and format ("P1").

    getFormat()
    Returns the format of the PBM image, which is always "P1".

  • Constructor Details

    • ImagePBM

      public ImagePBM(Pixel[][] pixels, int[] sizes, String imageName, String format)
      Constructs an ImagePBM object with specified pixel data, size, image name, and format ("P1").
      Parameters:
      pixels - The 2D array of Pixel objects representing the PBM image.
      sizes - The array containing width and height of the PBM image.
      imageName - The name of the PBM image file.
      format - The format of the PBM image ("P1").
